snippet: Ferguson will remain under a state of emergency for at least another night, county officials said on Wednesday.
abstract: Officials in Ferguson, Mo, say city will remain in state of emergency for at least one more night following shooting during protest to mark one-year anniversary of death of Michael Brown.
lead_paragraph: Ferguson will remain under a state of emergency for at least another night, county officials said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Missouri: State of Emergency Stays in Place in Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Missouri: State of Emergency Stays in Place in Ferguson
